title: Chloroclystis rufofasciata
text:
Chloroclystis rufofasciata is a <a href="moth">moth</a> in the family <a href="Geometer%20moth">Geometridae</a>. It is found in <a href="New%20Guinea">New Guinea</a>.
Adults are entirely silvery ash-grey with patches of scattered black scales on the fore- and hindwings.
